metadata.title: CVE-2024-37408 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: fprintd through 1.94.3 lacks a security attention mechanism, and thusunexpected actions might be authorized by "auth sufficient pam_fprintd.so"for Sudo. NOTE: the supplier disputes this because they believe issueresolution would involve modifying the PAM configuration to restrictpam_fprintd.so to front-ends that implement a proper attention mechanism,not modifying pam_fprintd.so or fprintd.

criterions.comment: fprintd package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-06-17').
